"""
AITA For getting a whole bunch of kids suspended and one kids expelled

So now I have to walk to the other side of school just to go to the bathroom.

When I saw him I thought about and said screw and told what was currently happening in the bathroom and went in and busted a whole bunch of kids. The reason I feel bad is because they were all freshmen(so like 14-15 year olds) who haven't fully realized how the world works. [Reupload because I'm new to reddit and forgot a proper title]
